鶼鶼鶼
鹣 鹣 鹣
jiān
mythical bird with one eye and one wing; see also 鲽鹣
мифическая птица с одним глазом и одним крылом; см. также 鲽鹣
[anki:play:a:0]

(Simplified: 鹣)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 兼 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 兼 [ jiān ] both, and; at the same time; to unite, to combine
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①(鶼鶼)古代傳說中的比翼鳥。
②(鶼鰈)喻夫妻恩愛。亦作“鶼鶼鰈鰈”。
鶼鰈 [ jiān dié ]: see 鲽鹣
鶼鶼 [ jiān jiān ]: lit. a pair of mythical birds who depend on each other; fig. an inseparable couple

鶼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古甜切，平添，見。］
“鹣1”的繁体字。
即鹣鹣。

鶼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶼； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1497第01
【廣韻】古甜切【集韻】【韻會】堅嫌切【正韻】古嫌切，?音兼。比翼鳥。【爾雅·釋鳥】南方有比翼鳥焉，不比不飛，其名謂之鶼鶼。【郭註】似鳧，靑赤色，一目一翼，相得乃飛。【正字通】山海經，崇吾山有鳥如鳧，一翼一目，曰??。拾遺記，周成王時，然丘國獻此鳥，如鵲而多力。水經注，林邑有比翼鳥，名歸飛，其鳴自呼。按諸說，則西海南山皆有之，鶼鶼與??實一也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" ancient sweet cut, add more, see you. ]
"鹣1" in traditional characters.
That is, 鹣鹣.
鹣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹣; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1497 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Ancient sweet cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Hard to cut [Zheng Yun] Ancient to cut, and sound. Lovebirds. [Erya·Shuniao] There is a winged bird in the south, which is not comparable to not flying, and its name is the 鹣. [Guo's Note] It looks like a mallard, has a red color, with one eye and one wing. [Zhengzitong] The scripture of mountains and seas, Chongwu Mountain has birds like mallards, with one wing and one eye, saying ??. Supplementary notes, when Zhou Chengwang, Ranqiu State presented this bird, like a magpie and powerful. Water classics note, Linyi has a lovebird, whose name goes to fly, and its voice calls itself. According to all theories, there are all in the West Hainan Mountains, and the 鹣鹣 is the same as the real one.
